121.content:
(I know how it ends for interactives like this, so many possibilities but no one adds or simply gives too many useless choices from the beginning, ending in company of other forgotten stories. Knowing this, I'm gonna write my idea without giving different options before. If someone wanna start another idea, he/she can add a chapter where the storyline restarts, bye bye)

—————————————————

Heimerdinger was so focused on his work: he got curious about elixirs and how they work. The continuous fights in the league took away so much time so he's proceeding slow. Decided to work on iron's elixir first, he was fascinated by the instant growth in dimensions. Heimer tried to examine what happens at molecular level, but it was too fast to see it clearly. Even knowing it was risky, he altered the elixir's structure to make it slower. It took days and every lab rat he had; reaching a possible success, but running out of subjects, he fell on his knees

"Darn, i miss my lab at Piltover so bad"

Heimerdinger is a yordle of science, but never considered living beings only as his own worthless guinea pigs. He couldn't kidnap someone like a crazy scientist, but...there's no harm in trying to ask. Wandering around the building, the little yordle found no one

"Is it possible that everyone is busy in the arenas?! Hmmm..........."

Mumbling hard, he failed noticing fluffy tails wrapping around him

-Something's bothering your overused brain, dear?"
"YARGH! Oh, Ahri, sorry i was assorted in my thoughts. *hmm hmm* Anyways, you spawned at the right time: I have a favor to ask you"
-You want me to be your experiment, don't you?-
"Well, you made it more rude than it is"
-*giggles* You're lucky, I'm bored and there's nothing to do here. What is it?-
"Come with me, I'll explain it on the road"

They reached the lab and Heimer showed to Ahri the flasks with the altered elixir

-So, all I have to do is drinking this iron's elixir you modified while you see the process?-
"Exactly, I won't forcing you if you don't want, I'm not even sure if the effects will be the same"
-Oh don't worry, there're worse things than being a failed experiment-

Ahri opened the flask and drank it all.
Usually, the elixir should have hit instantly, but Ahri felt nothing after 20 seconds

-Little doc, no offense, but i think you totally nullified the effects. I can't...wait, i think, ugh, it's starting-
"Oh good, now stay still, i need to have you on the lens"

Ahri was a bit confused, she already used the iron's elixir and knew what's the sensation, but this is different, she was feeling hot, aroused

-I...mmm...I don't know why, but, this feels good!-

Her confusion increased when she saw slabs of pectoral muscles grow under breast tissue, making the last ones firm. After that, she directed her attention to her right arm: her bicep went fast from lemon to grapefruit, softball size, shoulders ballooning rapidly, blocking her visual, neck thickening, making it almost impenetrable, the forearm bulging and defining crazy hard. Same for the left arm, it gave only more thrills to Ahri, while she was lost in pleasure at this point.
Moan after moan, she felt her back widening, even without touching it, she could feel hard steel definition from the neck to the hips, which are becoming bigger and even more alluring than before.
Her glutes bubbling up and firming, two bowling balls of a perfect ass

-AH! Yes! This feels so good, sex is nothing compared, i don't want it stop! *moan*-

Still not giving a heck, the scientist was accurately writing all the things he was seeing on the instrument.
Ahri tried hard to stay on her feet, she was experiencing a lustful sensation, stronger than everything she felt in her life. Her narrow waist became smaller, a 6 pack abs appeared, improved to an adamantine 8 pack, obliques following pretty fast, making her upper body really outstanding with muscles bigger than Illaoi's, her clothes are struggling to the tear point. Her legs was the next

-Aaaahhh! My pussy is so wet! I...need to...mmmmm~!-

She started fingering while her thighs were bulging in soccerball size, every muscle fiber was infused with incredible strength, calves rounding and surpassing her bicep's size. Her nipples were clearly visible through her dress

-Oh God, please, don't stop, more, more MORE!-

While still fingering and growing in height, her muscles seemed slowing down, but for real, they were only preparing for one big spurt

-It, it's coming, ah, ah, AAAHHHHHH!!!!-

She came, muscles exploded so hard that produced a small shockwave. Heimerdinger lost his balance for an instant while Ahri grew and grew. Her muscles weren't only becoming bigger and harder, but sexier as well, her boobs surpassing what can be defined as human size, her hard nipples uncovered as her dress was completely destroyed.
When her orgasm faded, the growth stopped. Descending from her mindblowing pleasure, she started to admire her body. She was 6 feet 5 tall, biceps bigger than bowling balls, thighs as volleyballs, calves bigger than the head, enciclopedia pecs those were allowing her R size boobs to defy gravity. She massaged her tits and understood they were almost sensitive as her pussy was. She saw a full length mirror on the left and felt her legs weak at the sight

-Oh my, I'm, I'm...so big, so beautiful, so...nnrrrrggghh *FLEX* strong! I never felt so good in my life-

Heimerdinger was shocked by the results: the alterations made to the elixir didn't only slowed down the process, they amplified and located them, stimulating the ero points of the subject

"Gosh, that wasn't expected at all"
-I don't care doc, this is incredible, i love these results. *FLEX* Oh yeah, rise bigger, my bicep!-
"Happy for you, but we need to understand what made you like this"

"Probably"

Does Ahri have something in mind?

info.brief_description: The girl from League of Legends experience some extreme muscle growth...
info.description:
This story revolves around the universe of league of legends, you are free to grow any girl in this universe in any way (although it would be preferable if you went around fmg).
the only things that are not allowed are:

- Toilet stuff (includes gas and other stinky stuff)
- Weight gain
- Death of some characters
- Hermaphrodites
- Scat

Apart from these its all pretty chilled, feel free to add!
More rules will be added if i feel the need to add them.




P.S:

- Participate :)
- Respect other people work (try to follow their chapters and/or the story!)
- Focus on descriptive growth and reality changes : that's what the story is about!
- Reality changes (Clear enough ?) so people don't know about the changes of the world or themselves
- Don't go into rampage ! No "Brenda is suddenly 100 000 feet and crushes everything" : play with the characters and elements of the story, but don't break them !
- No one-line additions (except when it's for giving people more choices, but keep it cool anyway!).
- You have ideas? You want to add your character? You're welcome!
- You have an idea and you want to see it in the story ? You can participate (you're very welcome, try it !)... or just send a mail ! I can't promise anything, but it's better than waiting for your idea to magically appear !
- And english isn't my native language, so forgive me, but do your best : I'm doing the same here :)
